body_html: It's going to be painful to train fully convolutional networks on multiple GPUs that cannot afford to have huge batch sizes to alleviate the problems that might arise out of not synchronizing mean and variance among GPUs.
body_text: It's going to be painful to train fully convolutional networks on multiple GPUs that cannot afford to have huge batch sizes to alleviate the problems that might arise out of not synchronizing mean and variance among GPUs.
body: It's going to be painful to train fully convolutional networks on multiple GPUs that cannot afford to have huge batch sizes to alleviate the problems that might arise out of not synchronizing mean and variance among GPUs.
